    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerMove

        public void onPlayerMove(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerMoveEvent e)
        Event handler for PlayerMoveEvent. It checks if the player is within a ProtectedRegion. If they are, it removes pets that shouldn't be there that are within their vicinity.
        Parameters:
        e - The PlayerMoveEvent to respond to.

      • onPlayerInteractEntity

        public void onPlayerInteractEntity(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEntityEvent e)
        Event handler for PlayerInteractEntityEvent. If the player shift right-clicks a pet with shears, it checks if the player owns it or can untame it through the permission node, and untames it, also removing it from the database. If the player shift right-clicks a pet with a bone, it tells them whether or not it is tamed.
        Parameters:
        e - The event

      • isApplicableInteraction

        private boolean isApplicableInteraction(org.bukkit.entity.Entity ent,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Player pl,
                                        java.lang.String key)
        Checks if the interaction is applicable based on certain parameters.
        Parameters:
        ent - The entity that was interacted with.
        pl - The player that did the interacting.
        key - The type of material data expected, per config options
        Returns:
        if the entity is of the correct type, the player is sneaking, and the player is holding the right item
